snippet: An unadvertised use for the OraQuick test may become popular and even help slow the AIDS epidemic, experts said.
abstract: OraQuick, first rapid home-testing kit for HIV, has gone on sale but some experts and advocates say that another, unadvertised use for test--screening potential sexual partners--may become popular and even help slow the epidemic.
lead_paragraph: An unadvertised use for the OraQuick test may become popular and even help slow the AIDS epidemic, experts said.

headline.seo: Another Use for Home H.I.V. Test: Screening Partners
headline.main: Another Use for Rapid Home H.I.V. Test: Screening Sexual Partners
headline.print_headline: Another Use for Rapid Home H.I.V. Test: Screening Sexual Partners
